params.text: Dodo anoonya maama.
Asanga ebikopo mwenda.
Asanga ebibya mukaaga.
Asanga ebimuli bitaano.
Asanga ebivuga eby’okuyimba bisatu.
Asanga emikono ebiri.
Dodo asanga maama omu.

"Okukweka n'okukwekula" credits

This work, "Okukweka n'okukwekula", is a derivative of "Hide and Seek" written by All Children Reading Cambodia. © The Asia Foundation 2019, and used under CC BY. "Hide and Seek" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.

Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
